document.masterDocTitle: Review of the genus Alysia Latreille (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Alysiinae), with description of six new species from China

figureCitation.captionText-0: FIGURE 13. Alysia fossulata Provancher, ♀, China (Shaanxi), habitus, lateral aspect.
figureCitation.captionText-1: FIGURE 14. Alysia fossulata Provancher, ♀, China (Shaanxi), A, wing; B, mesosoma, lateral aspect; C, mesosoma, dorsal aspect; D, propodeum, first and second metasomal tergites, dorsal aspect; E, propodeum and metasoma, dorsal aspect; F, basal segments of antenna, lateral aspect; G, ovipositor and ovipositor sheath, lateral aspect; H, head, dorsal aspect; I, head, anterior aspect; J, head, lateral aspect; K, mandible, full view on first and second teeth; L, mandible, full view on third tooth; M, hind leg, lateral aspect; N, antenna, lateral aspect.
